Description: Silver finger-ring; stirrup-shaped with a rounded hoop; oval bezel with engraved design of a crowned hawk behind which is a sun disc; surface poorly preserved.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Enkomi
Bibliographic references: Finger Ring / Catalogue of the Finger Rings, Greek, Etruscan, and Roman, in the Departments of Antiquities, British Museum (999)
Jacobsson 1994 / Aegyptiaca from Late Bronze Age Cyprus (No. 307)
Kenna 1971 / Catalogue of the Cypriote Seals of the Bronze Age in the British Museum (No. 44)
